segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, waiting for her brother to give her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's reaching up with her hand open, ready to catch a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I remember being just like her, waiting for a treat from my older sibling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her eyes are fixed on the cookie jar, like it's the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't seem to notice the water on the floor or the danger her brother is in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she gets her cookie, but I also hope they don't get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is still completely unaware of what's going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's excitement is contagious, I can't help but smile watching her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what her favorite kind of cookie is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I'm right there with her, waiting for that cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they share those cookies with me too.
segments.speaker: PAR
